# BlazorUI Component Library - LLM Coding Agent Guide

**Project:** BlazorUI - A comprehensive Blazor component library based on shadcn/ui design
**Repository:** https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui

---

## Package Overview

### BlazorUI.Primitives
**Purpose:** Headless, unstyled components providing behavior and accessibility without styling
**Use when:** You need full control over styling and appearance

### BlazorUI.Components
**Purpose:** Pre-styled components with shadcn/ui design using Tailwind CSS
**Use when:** You want beautiful, ready-to-use components with minimal configuration

### BlazorUI.Icons
**Purpose:** Lucide icon library integration with 1,640+ icons
**Use when:** You need scalable, customizable SVG icons

---

## Primitives (16 Components)

**Accordion Primitive** - Vertically stacked sections of content that can be expanded or collapsed with keyboard navigation support. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Accordion

**Checkbox Primitive** - Binary selection control supporting checked, unchecked, and indeterminate states with ARIA attributes. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Checkbox

**Collapsible Primitive** - Expandable content area with trigger control for showing and hiding content. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Collapsible

**Combobox Primitive** - Autocomplete input with dropdown suggestions, keyboard navigation, and search functionality. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Combobox

**Dialog Primitive** - Modal window with overlay, focus trap, and escape key handling for accessible dialogs. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Dialog

**Dropdown Menu Primitive** - Context menu with items, keyboard navigation, and intelligent positioning. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/DropdownMenu

**Hover Card Primitive** - Rich content preview that appears on hover with configurable show/hide delays. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/HoverCard

**Label Primitive** - Accessible label element with automatic input association for form controls. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Label

**Popover Primitive** - Floating content panel anchored to a trigger element with click-outside-to-close. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Popover

**Radio Group Primitive** - Mutually exclusive selection control with arrow key navigation between options. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/RadioGroup

**Select Primitive** - Dropdown selection menu with keyboard navigation, search, and option groups. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Select

**Sheet Primitive** - Side panel that slides in from viewport edge with overlay and focus management. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Sheet

**Switch Primitive** - Toggle control for binary on/off states with keyboard and mouse interaction. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Switch

**Table Primitive** - Data table with sorting, pagination, and selection capabilities (Phase 1-2 complete). - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Table

**Tabs Primitive** - Tabbed interface with keyboard navigation and horizontal/vertical orientation support. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Tabs

**Tooltip Primitive** - Brief informational popup on hover or focus with intelligent positioning. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Primitives/Primitives/Tooltip

---

## Components (30 Components)

### Form Components (9)

**Button** - Interactive button with multiple variants (default, destructive, outline, secondary, ghost, link) and sizes. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Button

**Button Group** - Visually groups related buttons with connected styling and optional separators. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/ButtonGroup

**Checkbox** - Styled checkbox component with shadcn/ui design and indeterminate state support. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Checkbox

**Input** - Text input fields with multiple types (text, email, password) and sizes for form data entry. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Input

**Input Group** - Enhanced inputs with icons, buttons, and addons for complex input compositions. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/InputGroup

**Label** - Styled label component for accessible form control labeling with automatic association. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Label

**Radio Group** - Styled radio button group for mutually exclusive selections with keyboard navigation. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/RadioGroup

**Switch** - Styled toggle switch for binary on/off states with shadcn/ui design. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Switch

**Textarea** - Multi-line text input with automatic content-based sizing and validation support. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Textarea

### Layout & Navigation Components (8)

**Accordion** - Styled collapsible content sections with smooth animations and shadcn/ui design. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Accordion

**Card** - Container component for grouped content with header, body, and footer sections. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Card

**Collapsible** - Styled expandable content area with trigger control and smooth transitions. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Collapsible

**Field** - Combines labels, controls, help text, and error messages for accessible, structured forms. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Field

**Item** - Flexible list item component with media (avatar/icon), content, and action areas. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Item

**Separator** - Visual divider for content sections with horizontal and vertical orientation support. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Separator

**Sidebar** - Responsive navigation sidebar with collapsible menus, keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl/Cmd+B), and mobile support. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Sidebar

**Tabs** - Styled tabbed interface for organizing related content with keyboard navigation. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Tabs

### Overlay Components (8)

**Combobox** - Styled autocomplete input with searchable dropdown and keyboard navigation. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Combobox

**Command** - Command palette for quick actions and navigation with keyboard shortcuts and search. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Command

**Dialog** - Styled modal dialog with backdrop, focus management, and shadcn/ui design. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Dialog

**Dropdown Menu** - Styled context menu with items, separators, keyboard shortcuts, and nested submenus. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/DropdownMenu

**Hover Card** - Styled rich preview card on hover with delay control and shadcn/ui design. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/HoverCard

**Popover** - Styled floating panel for additional content and actions with shadcn/ui design. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Popover

**Sheet** - Styled side panel that slides in from viewport edges with overlay and animations. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Sheet

**Tooltip** - Styled brief informational popup on hover or focus with shadcn/ui design. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Tooltip

### Display Components (5)

**Avatar** - User profile image component with fallback support for initials and icons. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Avatar

**Badge** - Label component for displaying status, categories, and metadata with multiple variants. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Badge

**Data Table** - Powerful table component with sorting, filtering, pagination, and row selection built on Table Primitive. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/DataTable

**Select** - Styled dropdown selection component with groups, labels, and shadcn/ui design. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Select

**Skeleton** - Animated loading placeholder for content and images during data fetching. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Components/Components/Skeleton

---

## Icons Package

**LucideIcon Component** - Renders any of 1,640+ Lucide icons as customizable SVG elements with accessibility support. - https://github.com/blazorui-net/ui/tree/main/src/BlazorUI.Icons

**Usage:** `<LucideIcon Name="icon-name" />`

**Parameters:**
- `Name` (required): Icon name in kebab-case (e.g., "camera", "chevron-down", "arrow-right")
- `Size` (default: 24): Icon size in pixels
- `Color` (default: "currentColor"): CSS color value
- `StrokeWidth` (default: 2.0): SVG stroke width
- `Class`: Additional CSS classes
- `AriaLabel`: Accessibility label
- `AdditionalAttributes`: Any additional SVG attributes

**Example:**
```razor
<LucideIcon Name="settings" Size="20" Class="text-blue-500" />
```

---

## Key Architecture Patterns

### 1. Two-Layer Architecture
**Primitives Layer:** Headless components with behavior and accessibility, zero styling
**Components Layer:** Pre-styled components built on primitives with shadcn/ui design

**When to use Primitives:** Need full control over styling
**When to use Components:** Want shadcn/ui design out-of-the-box

### 2. Component Naming Convention
**Primitives:** Add "Primitive" suffix when importing
**Components:** No suffix needed

### 3. State Management Patterns

**Uncontrolled Mode:** Component manages its own state
```razor
<Tabs DefaultValue="tab1">
    <TabsList>...</TabsList>
</Tabs>
```

**Controlled Mode:** Parent manages state with @bind-
```razor
<Tabs @bind-Value="currentTab">
    <TabsList>...</TabsList>
</Tabs>
```

### 4. Composition Pattern

Components use `ChildContent` for flexible composition:
```razor
<Card>
    <CardHeader>
        <CardTitle>Title</CardTitle>
    </CardHeader>
    <CardContent>Content</CardContent>
</Card>
```

### 5. Portal Pattern

Overlay components (Dialog, Sheet, Popover, Tooltip, HoverCard, Select, Combobox) use portals for proper z-index stacking.

### 7. Styling System

**CSS Variables:** Theme system using HSL color values
**Tailwind CSS:** Utility-first styling
**Dark mode:** Built-in light/dark theme support

---

## Common Patterns

### Form with Validation
```razor
<Field>
    <FieldLabel>Email</FieldLabel>
    <FieldContent>
        <Input @bind-Value="email" Type="email" />
    </FieldContent>
    <FieldDescription>Enter your email address</FieldDescription>
    <FieldError>@errorMessage</FieldError>
</Field>
```

### Dialog with Form
```razor
<Dialog>
    <DialogTrigger>
        <Button>Open Dialog</Button>
    </DialogTrigger>
    <DialogContent>
        <DialogHeader>
            <DialogTitle>Edit Profile</DialogTitle>
            <DialogDescription>Make changes to your profile</DialogDescription>
        </DialogHeader>
        <!-- Form content -->
        <DialogFooter>
            <Button>Save</Button>
        </DialogFooter>
    </DialogContent>
</Dialog>
```

### Data Table with Sorting and Pagination
```razor
<DataTable Data="users" @bind-State="tableState">
    <DataTableColumn TData="User" Property="u => u.Name" Title="Name" Sortable="true" />
    <DataTableColumn TData="User" Property="u => u.Email" Title="Email" />
    <DataTableColumn TData="User" Property="u => u.Role" Title="Role" Filterable="true" />
</DataTable>
<TablePagination State="tableState" />
```

### Sidebar Navigation
```razor
<SidebarProvider>
    <Sidebar>
        <SidebarHeader>
            <SidebarHeaderContent>App Name</SidebarHeaderContent>
        </SidebarHeader>
        <SidebarContent>
            <SidebarMenu>
                <SidebarMenuItem>
                    <SidebarMenuButton>
                        <LucideIcon Name="home" Size="16" />
                        Home
                    </SidebarMenuButton>
                </SidebarMenuItem>
            </SidebarMenu>
        </SidebarContent>
    </Sidebar>
    <SidebarInset>
        <!-- Main content -->
    </SidebarInset>
</SidebarProvider>
```

### Command Palette
```razor
<Command>
    <CommandInput Placeholder="Type a command..." />
    <CommandList>
        <CommandEmpty>No results found.</CommandEmpty>
        <CommandGroup Heading="Suggestions">
            <CommandItem>
                <LucideIcon Name="calendar" />
                Calendar
            </CommandItem>
        </CommandGroup>
    </CommandList>
</Command>
```

---

**Last Updated:** 2025-11-14
